Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory63.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Although the three Cerberus members have fought together before occasionally, their fights have never felt as good as this timeâ€”'}
{3: 'At least, not for Vera.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Have we not fought together like this enough in the past?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'I suppose. We were usually assigned to assist other teams.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Tch... That felt good.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Can I bring some souvenirs back, Captain?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hm? Sure. No one else is here.', 4: '2'}
{3: "No. 21 grabs a few Corrupted parts that are bending at weird angles. There is rarely anyone visiting the no man's land, so the parts here are pretty old."}

{3: "And because this is no man's land, the Punishing Virus concentration here is relatively low, and there is less Punishing Virus inside the Corrupted here than those in the Punishing-afflicted areas."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Nothing like a fight, am I right, Captain?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Isn't this much better? You can only punch sandbags on Babylonia when you're upset, and they never feel as good as the faces of actual enemies.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You're so right. I gotta ask WGAA to make a batch of sandbags with your face on them. I'm sure I'll get a real kick out of them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Shellhead Noctis is now sandbag Noctis. Sandbag, sandbag...', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'More like a dumbass.', 4: '2'}
{3: "And so, the three Cerberus members walk back to the mechanic's shop, chattering on an empty field."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory544.jpg'}
{3: 'By the time they are back, the sun has fully set below the horizon. Lit by a few spotlights, their car sits outside of the shop, its engine running.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Not bad, not bad. We've sorted out your troubles. They were just a few goons.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: "Oh? You've... taken care of it? Just like that?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "And we've got souvenirs.", 4: '1'}
{3: "No. 21 puts the parts she took into the trunk. The owner instinctively dodges No. 21's sharp claws and the machines that still have a hint of the Punishing Virus on them."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Is something wrong?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Owner', 3: "Ah... ah. Nothing. It's nothing.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Underneath the dim spotlights, Noctis and No. 21 are paying all their attention to the now repaired and excessively "decorated" car.'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: 'The car is fixed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What a bargain, huh?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The owner nervously wipes his hands with a towel that is barely any cleaner, smiling awkwardly.'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: "I won't delay the three of you any longer, then. See you... around.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Excuse me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: 'Sorry. I meant to say... goodbye.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: 'A fixed car better not break down... better not.', 4: '2'}
